venn.optim
Class Individual

java.lang.Object
  venn.optim.Individual
public class Individual
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a graphical representation of a set family. An individual has an cost value (inverse fitness): getCost()

Author:
muellera

getDeviations

public void getDeviations(double[][] d)
Returns all area deviations. This are the differences card-area. So d[i][j] is (for i<>j) negative if the graphical intersection is greater than the desired cardinality and positive if the cardinality is greater than the graphical intersection.

Parameters:
d -

getPressureCost

public double getPressureCost()
Returns:
pressure cost term (to force sets which are far away)
